brahma# jaj~jAqnamiti# ruqkmamupa# dadhAtiq brahma#muKAq vai praqjApa#tiH praqjA a#sRujataq brahma#muKA Eqva tat praqjA yaja#mAnaH sRujatEq brahma# jaj~jAqnamityA#haq tasmA$dbrAhmaqNO muKyOq muKyO# Bavatiq ya EqvaM ~MvEda# brahmavAqdinO# vadantiq na pRu#thiqvyAM nAntari#kShEq na diqvya#gniScE#taqvya# itiq yat pRu#thiqvyAM ci#nvIqta 
pRu#thiqvI(gm) SuqcA&rpa#yEqnnauSha#dhayOq na vanaqspata#yaqH - [  ] 36
